about.title: About
about.description1: I'm a Fullstack software engineer with experience in web and mobile development. I specialize in fullstack web and mobile development using technologies like React, Next.js, NestJS, and PostgreSQL.
about.description2: From academic projects to real-world applications, I've built tools that support collaboration, e-commerce, and even AI-powered features. I enjoy learning new technologies and challenging myself to create real, usable solutions.

fullstack.title: Fullstack Web & Mobile Development
fullstack.description: Building responsive websites and cross-platform mobile apps using modern frameworks like Vue.js, React, Next.js, and React Native.

team.title: System Design & UI/UX
team.description: Designing systems with multiple roles, ensuring security and performance, while creating beautiful, user-friendly interfaces.

ai.title: AI Integration & Learning
ai.description: Exploring how AI can enhance user experienceâ€”such as AI-generated tasks, virtual try-ons.

experiences.description: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, through which acquired knowledge and skills in problem solving, computer science, and software development. Expected to graduate in 2026.

First time working in a professional software development environment. Get to know the workflow of building applications in a team, using version control with Git and collaborating through Agile methodologies.

After two-months of internship, I was rated as exceeding expectations and offered a full-time position as a Fullstack Developer. Working on building and maintaining web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

projects.description: Here are some of my notable projects that showcase my skills in fullstack development, system design, and AI integration.

workspacing.title: Workspacing
workspacing.description: An all-in-one productivity platform for personal and team workspaces with text editors for documents and kanban board for tasks, along with AI-powered task suggestions.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: My own auth toolkit with reusable components, hooks and utils to use auth in server & client components, API routes and server actions.

clothing.title: Clothing Shop
clothing.description: An ecommerce platform with website and mobile app for selling and buying clothes.

vonders.title: Vonders
vonders.description: A web-based platform to explore Vietnam's most iconic destinations, cultural events, and travel tours.

contact.description: Feel free to reach out, I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: I'm currently working on creating meaningful content to share my journey, insights, and learnings in software development.
